meta.notes: Standing Stones as lightweight Extras. Each provides a passive perk and a built-in compel hook for balance.

stones.name: The Warrior Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, gain +2 to Overcome using Fight/Physique when brute skill or discipline matters.
stones.compel_hook: Glory-seeking; you escalate rather than negotiate.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, treat your first physical consequence as one step less severe if you immediately press the attack.
act_upgrades.act_5: In the first exchange of a conflict, gain a free invoke on 'Steel Before Speech'.

stones.name: The Mage Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, gain +2 to Create Advantage using Lore when casting, warding, or deciphering magic.
stones.compel_hook: Curiosity overrides caution; you touch the forbidden thing.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, you may swap one action’s approach (e.g., Fight→Lore) if you describe a magical method.
act_upgrades.act_5: Your first successful spell-based Create Advantage in a scene grants an extra free invoke.

stones.name: The Thief Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, gain +2 to Overcome using Stealth/Deceit when bypassing guards, locks, or attention.
stones.compel_hook: You take the riskier shortcut; it creates new trouble.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, if you succeed with style on a stealthy Overcome, gain a boost even if the GM would not normally grant one.
act_upgrades.act_5: In infiltration scenes, begin with a free boost: 'Two Steps Ahead'.

stones.name: The Lover Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, help an ally: grant them +2 on a roll where you can plausibly assist.
stones.compel_hook: You protect someone at the worst possible time.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, you may take a consequence instead of an ally when you defend them.
act_upgrades.act_5: Once per session, convert a boost into a full scene aspect with one free invoke.

stones.name: The Shadow Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, declare you disappear from immediate notice (Create Advantage at +2) if shadows exist.
stones.compel_hook: Secrecy isolates you; allies feel excluded or suspicious.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, you may move to a new zone without opposition if you’re unseen.
act_upgrades.act_5: Your first stealth-based Create Advantage in a scene grants two free invokes (GM may compel fallout later).

stones.name: The Ritual Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, perform a significant ritual as a Challenge: take +2 on one roll of the challenge.
stones.compel_hook: Ritual demands time/components; clocks tick while you prepare.

act_upgrades.act_3: Rituals can create lasting campaign aspects (with GM agreement) once per act.
act_upgrades.act_5: Once per session, you may reduce a ritual challenge by 1 roll if you accept a complication.

stones.name: The Serpent Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, when you succeed on an Attack, you may add a mild consequence 'Poisoned' instead of normal stress (fiction permitting).
stones.compel_hook: Your methods are feared; witnesses react badly.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, your first Create Advantage with poison/dirty tricks gets +2.
act_upgrades.act_5: Once per session, you may turn an enemy boost into a consequence by escalating cruelty.

stones.name: The Steed Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, gain +2 to Overcome using Athletics when chasing, escaping, or forced marches.
stones.compel_hook: Restlessness; you push the pace and exhaust others.

act_upgrades.act_3: You may ignore one terrain-based penalty per scene.
act_upgrades.act_5: Once per scene, you may act first in an exchange if you enter the scene in motion.

stones.name: The Tower Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, bypass a lock/barrier as if you had the right key (narratively justified).
stones.compel_hook: Locks break loudly; consequences follow (guards, damage, blame).

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per session, create advantage 'Access Granted' with one free invoke when breaking into a place.
act_upgrades.act_5: In Act V infiltration, you may declare one obstacle was already prepared for.

stones.name: The Lord Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, reduce the severity of a physical consequence by one step (with a narrative explanation).
stones.compel_hook: You feel invincible and take hits you shouldn’t.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, gain +2 to defend using Physique against physical harm.
act_upgrades.act_5: Once per session, clear an additional stress box after a conflict.

stones.name: The Lady Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, immediately clear a mild consequence if you can take a short rest or receive care.
stones.compel_hook: You try to heal everyone; it costs time and safety.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, your Create Advantage related to aid/healing gains +2.
act_upgrades.act_5: Once per session, remove a lingering negative scene aspect by tending the situation.

stones.name: The Apprentice Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, gain +2 to an Attack that is explicitly magical or explosive in nature.
stones.compel_hook: Power backfires; the GM gets a juicy compel on collateral damage.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, your first spellcasting roll gains a boost on success.
act_upgrades.act_5: Once per session, you may force a reroll in your favor… but accept a complication.

stones.name: The Atronach Stone
stones.passive: Once per session, when targeted by magic, you may gain +2 to defend; on success, create advantage 'Stolen Spark' with one free invoke.
stones.compel_hook: Magic resistance isolates you; beneficial spells struggle to affect you.

act_upgrades.act_3: Once per scene, you may convert a magical attack you defended against into a boost.
act_upgrades.act_5: Once per session, nullify a minor magical effect outright (GM defines).
